text: pretty dang good!
author: AMERI-FREEDOM!

text:
Well today was probably one of the most physically demanding days of my life. I trecked through about 18km (10 miles?) of mountains. I didn't think it'd be that hard, but it was.

Anyways, I had to add this game to the list. I loved it as a kid, I liked the hybrid gameplay between space shooting and top-down action game. This melody stuck with me the most over the years.
author: SupraDarky
